meanings.definition: A young hen, especially one that has been fattened for cooking.
meanings.sent1: The poularde clucked happily in the farmyard.
meanings.sent2: The chef prepared a delicious dish using poularde meat.
meanings.sent3: Why did the poularde refuse to play hide and seek? Because it was always chicken!
meanings.sent4: The poularde stood out among the other hens like a golden treasure.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the roasting poularde filled the kitchen with warmth and anticipation.

meanings.definition: The meat of a poularde, often considered to be tender and flavorful.
meanings.sent1: The restaurant served a succulent dish made with poularde.
meanings.sent2: Many people enjoy the taste of poularde in various recipes.
meanings.sent3: Why did the poularde win the cooking competition? Because it was a seasoned pro!
meanings.sent4: The poularde meat melted in her mouth like butter on a warm day.
meanings.sent5: The tender poularde was the highlight of the dinner party, pleasing all the guests.
